title: Mark Cuban Says AI Job Seekers Should Target Small-To-Medium Companies Rather Than Big Corporations
description: Mark Cuban, the billionaire investor and serial entrepreneur, has long advocated that people of all ages should focus on building their understanding of artificial intelligence (AI) and put those skills to use in advancing their careers. In a recent podcast, he suggested that job seekers should showcase their AI expertise to smaller firms rather than the big corporations pouring money into the technology.

title: Rise of the robots: the promise of physical AI
description: A pair of swivelling, human-like robotic arms, built for physical artificial intelligence research, mirror the motions of an operator in a VR headset twirling his hands like a magician.
content:

title: 7 things about CBSE's draft AI curriculum for Classes III to XII
description: The Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) has prepared a draft curriculum to integrate artificial intelligence education into school learning from Classes III to XII. This draft has been sent to the National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) for review and approval.
content: The Central Board of Secondary Education has moved closer to introducing a structured framework for teaching digital and analytical thinking across Indian schools. A draft proposal on the integration of artificial intelligence and computational think... [1637 chars]

title: How Indian and global enterprises are redefining CXO roles to stay ahead in an AI-driven economy
description: Artificial intelligence is now central to Indian business strategy. New leadership roles like Chief AI Officer are emerging. Companies are upskilling executives to meet demand. Ethics and trust are key considerations. Organisations are redesigning structures to embrace AI. India's AI market is set for significant growth.

title: Reliance's Bold Leap: Revolutionizing AI Infrastructure and Renewable Energy in Andhra
description: Reliance Industries Limited plans to establish a 1 GW Artificial Intelligence Data Centre in Andhra Pradesh, along with a 6 GWp solar power project to boost renewable energy. Additionally, a Greenfield Integrated Food Park will be developed in Rayalaseema, generating jobs and supporting local families.
content: Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) is set to transform Andhra Pradesh with a state-of-the-art 1 GW Artificial Intelligence Data Centre, harnessing the latest in GPU, TPU, and AI processor technologies. This facility will complement Reliance's existing... [738 chars]

title: Nashik: Eklavya Schools To Pilot AI-Based Teaching Programme
description: A two-day Artificial Intelligence (AI) training workshop was organised for teachers of Ekalavya Model Residential School at Mitra (Nashik Road).

title: AI poses threat to journalism in Japan, news association chair says
description: Japan’s publishers are concerned about the impact generative artificial intelligence is having on the news business, Shiro Nakamura said.
content: Generative artificial intelligence poses a threat to journalistic integrity and the business of journalism, said the chair of the prominent Asahi Shimbun, one of the Japanese media outlets suing U.S. startup Perplexity AI over copyright infringement.... [508 chars]
